title: IRIS USA Screw Organizer, Hardware Storage Organizer, 44 Drawer Parts Cabinet, Plastic Drawer Storage for Hardware Crafts, Small Parts, Nuts and Bolts, Tool Storage, Scrapbook Art Hobby - Black
description: IRIS USA Drawer Parts Cabinet / Craft Cabinet

IRIS USA Drawer Parts Cabinet / Craft Cabinet is a practical storage solution for home, garage, workshop, or office. You can store small parts or accessories, and categorize them with each drawer to organize your space. With this parts drawer, you could easily find things you need.
This plastic cabinet will organize and protect your small parts, office supplies, crafts, beads, hardware, fishing, and more.
Securely stack multiple units with interlocking feet, or four mounting holes allow the cabinet to easily hang on a wall.
These multiples drawers allow you to sort and store your items by each category to easily identify a specific item you are looking for! You can even label each drawer to make it more obvious.
These conveniently sized drawers are great for holding an array of small pieces, and the built-in lip at the back means they won’t fall out of the drawer cabinet when opened.

Drawers are made to fit a longer item like pens and markers, so it is also suitable for organizing your stationaries. The perfect organizer on teacher desk, or craft workspace, garage workspace, a vanity desk for makeup and accessories and so much more!
Small inner drawer for multi-drawer stackable cabinet measures 6. 00” x 1. 75” x 1. 50”. Large inner drawer measures 6. 00” x 4. 00” x 2. 00”.
: This product is made out of recyclable material. Eco-friendly product. We can organize our home and protect our planet at the same time!
: High-quality materials are used for our domestically-manufactured products.
